about_the_game:
The Commission: Organized Crime Grand Strategy Original Soundtrack features 8 tracks composed by Steph Nguyen. The soundtrack was inspired by the slow-paced jazz and tones that reflect the noir-esque atmosphere of the late 1920s and early 1930s.

Tracks


The soundtrack includes the following tracks:

  • Welcome to New Shore
  • Famiglia
  • Bogiana
  • Calessi
  • Regal Heights
  • Donano
  • Junio
  • Rocca

Tracks are .mp3 and average 2 minutes in length.

fullgame.name: The Commission: Organized Crime Grand Strategy

legal_notice: The Commission: Organized Crime Grand Strategy is a Registered Trademark of 2:30 AM Studios. This story is a work of fiction influenced by historical circumstances. All characters in this game are fictitious. Any resemblance to actual events or persons, living or dead, is entirely coincidental.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.9.5 or later
  • Processor: 2.26GHz Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9400M
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 or later
  • Processor: 2.3GHz Dual‑core
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus Graphics 640

name: The Commission - OST

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 @ 2.2GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600+ @ 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 240 GT or Radeon HD 6570 – 1024 MB (1 gig)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2300 or AMD FX6120
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti or Radeon HD 6770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: The Commission: Organized Crime Grand Strategy OST features 8 tracks composed by Steph Nguyen.
